longBusinessSummary: Tolins Tyres Limited manufactures and sells new tires and tread rubber in India. It offers two-wheeler, three-wheeler, light commercial vehicle, and agricultural tires; precured tread rubber; and other accessories, including bonding gum, camel back - conventional rubber, curing bags, rope rubber, tubes, tire flaps, vulcanizing solutions, etc. The company also exports its products to 40 countries, including the Middle East, East Africa, Jordan, Kenya, and Egypt. Tolins Tyres Limited was founded in 1982 and is based in Aluva, India.
